custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CommerceChannelRel.commerceChannelRelId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM CommerceChannelRel JOIN CommerceChannel ON CommerceChannelRel.commerceChannelId = CommerceChannel.commerceChannelId WHERE (CommerceChannelRel.classNameId = ?) AND (CommerceChannelRel.classPK = ?) AND (LOWER(CommerceChannel.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])

SELECT DISTINCT CommerceChannelRel.* FROM CommerceChannelRel JOIN CommerceChannel ON CommerceChannelRel.commerceChannelId = CommerceChannel.commerceChannelId WHERE (CommerceChannelRel.classNameId = ?) AND (CommerceChannelRel.classPK = ?) AND (LOWER(CommerceChannel.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])

SELECT CPAttachmentFileEntry.* FROM CPAttachmentFileEntry WHERE (CPAttachmentFileEntry.expirationDate < ?) AND (CPAttachmentFileEntry.expirationDate IS NOT NULL) AND ([$OWNER_USER_ID$] [$OWNER_USER_ID_AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] ([$STATUS$]))

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CPDefinition.CPDefinitionId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM CPDefinition LEFT JOIN CPDefinitionLocalization ON (CPDefinition.CPDefinitionId = CPDefinitionLocalization.CPDefinitionId) AND (CPDefinitionLocalization.languageId = ?) WHERE (CPDefinition.groupId = ?) AND (CPDefinition.productTypeName = ?) AND ([$OWNER_USER_ID$] [$OWNER_USER_ID_AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] ([$STATUS$]))

SELECT CPDefinition.* FROM CPDefinition LEFT JOIN CPDefinitionLocalization ON CPDefinition.CPDefinitionId = CPDefinitionLocalization.CPDefinitionId WHERE (CPDefinition.expirationDate < ?) AND (CPDefinition.expirationDate IS NOT NULL) AND ([$OWNER_USER_ID$] [$OWNER_USER_ID_AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] ([$STATUS$]))

SELECT CPDefinition.* FROM CPDefinition LEFT JOIN CPDefinitionLocalization ON (CPDefinition.CPDefinitionId = CPDefinitionLocalization.CPDefinitionId) AND (CPDefinitionLocalization.languageId = ?) WHERE (CPDefinition.groupId = ?) AND (CPDefinition.productTypeName = ?) AND ([$OWNER_USER_ID$] [$OWNER_USER_ID_AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] ([$STATUS$]))
SELECT CPInstance.* FROM CPInstance WHERE (CPInstance.expirationDate < ?) AND (CPInstance.expirationDate IS NOT NULL) AND ([$OWNER_USER_ID$] [$OWNER_USER_ID_AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] ([$STATUS$]))

SELECT CPInstanceOptionValueRel.* FROM CPInstanceOptionValueRel INNER JOIN CPInstance ON (CPInstanceOptionValueRel.cpInstanceId = CPInstance.cpInstanceId) AND (CPInstance.cpDefinitionId = ?) AND (CPInstance.status = ?) ORDER BY CPInstanceOptionValueRel.cpInstanceId
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM CPTaxCategory WHERE (CPTaxCategory.companyId = [$COMPANY_ID$]) AND (LOWER(CPTaxCategory.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])
SELECT CPTaxCategory.* FROM CPTaxCategory WHERE (CPTaxCategory.companyId = [$COMPANY_ID$]) AND (LOWER(CPTaxCategory.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ORDER BY CPTaxCategory.name
